a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Deaths in state-based conflicts by world region
Direct deaths of both military personnel and civilians, attributed to world regions according to location of the conflict.
Deaths from disease or famine are not included.
Note: 'State-based' conflicts are between states, or a state and a non-state armed organised group. Shown are the 'best' deaths estimates –
the source also provides high and low estimates.
